content: पूरक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पूर्-ण्वुल्] {@--1@} Filling up, completing. {@--2@} Satisfying, making content. --कः {@--1@} The citron tree. {@--2@} A ball of meal offered at the conclusion of the oblations to the Manes. {@--3@} (In arith.) The multiplier. {@--4@} Closing the right nostril and inhaling air through the left (as a religious ceremony); <ab>cf.</ab> रेचक.
